Since July 12th of 2022 I haven't been able to use IG on my android ! I finally figured it out after unistalling and Reinstalling! If you're having this issue, Install Instagram , Go to your phone settings click (ALLOWED PERMISSIONS) on everything except location and your screen will no longer show black or white. With the last update , Android users were not automatically given permission to use the app, we have to do it ourselves. I hope this helps
